title: Auto-generate acceptance tests in Create Child Story modal
description: When clicking the Generate button on the Create Child Story modal, the system should automatically create acceptance tests for the user story using AI to analyze story content and generate relevant tests in Given-When-Then format. A new Acceptance Tests field should appear below existing modal content to display and allow editing of generated tests before saving.

acceptanceTests.title: Generate button creates AI-powered acceptance tests
acceptanceTests.description:
Given a user has filled out story details in the Create Child Story modal
When they click the Generate button
Then the system should analyze the story content using AI
And display generated acceptance tests in Given-When-Then format below the existing modal content

acceptanceTests.title: Generated tests are editable before saving
acceptanceTests.description:
Given acceptance tests have been generated and displayed in the modal
When the user views the Acceptance Tests field
Then they should be able to edit the generated test content
And modify tests before saving the story

acceptanceTests.title: Generate button handles AI service failures gracefully
acceptanceTests.description:
Given the AI service is unavailable or returns an error
When the user clicks the Generate button
Then the system should display an appropriate error message
And allow the user to proceed with manual test creation

tasks.title: Add Generate button to Create Child Story modal
Create AI service integration for test generation
Add Acceptance Tests field to modal UI
